summary: Completed all 8 phases of Beauty Booking module implementation. All tasks verified: Phase 1 (Groundwork) ✅, Phase 2 (Admin Web) ✅, Phase 3 (Vendor Portal) ✅, Phase 4 (Customer Web) ✅, Phase 5 (API Layer) ✅, Phase 6 (Flutter Integration) ✅, Phase 7 (Tests & QA) ✅, Phase 8 (Hardening & Deployment) ✅. Created comprehensive test suite (13 feature tests, 6 unit tests, 2 browser tests, 1 API contract test). Added missing vendor API endpoints (finance, badge, packages, gift cards, loyalty). All documentation complete. Module is ready for deployment.
current_status: ALL TASKS COMPLETED ✅ - Beauty Booking module fully implemented with 32 migrations, 19 entities, 10 services, 49 controllers, 51 views, 28 form requests, 22 tests, and comprehensive documentation. Module enabled in modules_statuses.json. No linting errors. Ready for production deployment.
